sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The OpenSP package contains onsgmls, ospam, osx, ospcat and ospent.

sect3.title: ospam
sect3.para: ospam is a markup stream editor.

sect3.title: osx
sect3.para: osx is a SGML normalizer or a converter of SGML to XML.

sect3.title: ospcat
sect3.para: ospcat prints effective system identifiers found in the catalogs.

sect3.title: ospent
sect3.para: ospent provides access to OpenSP's entity manager.
